reviews.review_msg: Parin was very disorganized. The syllabus was often wrong. She did however revise due dates because of this. She is a tough marker but doesn't give good feedback as to why she assigned that grade. I often received a lower grade than I thought I would and with only "GOOD" as feedback.
This class is as exciting as watching paint dry. Parin likes to spend a lot of time on pointless group work. Her assignment guidelines and instructions are unclear. I hated this class with a passion.
